flavorText: Instinct blood-tinted his world until he could see only one thing clearly: his prey.

foreignData.flavorText: Sein Instinkt färbte seine ganze Welt blutrot, bis er nur noch eine einzige Sache klar sehen konnte: seine Beute.
foreignData.name: Konzentration auf die Beute
foreignData.text: Du kannst Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, in diesem Zug ihren Kampfschaden dem verteidigenden Spieler zufügen lassen, als ob sie nicht geblockt würden.

foreignData.flavorText: El instinto tiñó de sangre su mundo hasta que lo único que pudo ver claramente era una cosa: su presa.
foreignData.name: Enfoque depredador
foreignData.text: Puedes hacer que las criaturas que controlas hagan su daño de combate al jugador defensor este turno como si no fueran bloqueadas.

foreignData.flavorText: Sa vision se brouilla d'une couleur de sang jusqu'à ce qu'il ne vit plus qu'une chose : sa proie.
foreignData.name: Focus prédatoire
foreignData.text: Vous pouvez faire que les créatures que vous contrôlez infligent ce tour-ci leurs blessures de combat au joueur défenseur comme si elles n'étaient pas bloquées.

foreignData.flavorText: L'istinto colorò di sangue il suo mondo, finché non poté vedere chiaramente altro che una cosa: la sua preda.
foreignData.name: Concentrazione Predatoria
foreignData.text: Puoi decidere che le creature che controlli infliggano il loro danno da combattimento al giocatore in difesa questo turno come se non fossero state bloccate.

foreignData.flavorText: ある一つの物を彼がはっきり認識するまで、本能は世界を血の色に染める。それは、餌食だ。
foreignData.name: 捕食の焦点
foreignData.text: このターン、あなたはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャーが与える戦闘ダメージを、ブロックされていないかのように防御プレイヤーに与えてもよい。

foreignData.flavorText: O instinto tingiu seu mundo de sangue até que só pudesse ver uma coisa com clareza: sua presa.
foreignData.name: Foco Predatório
foreignData.text: As criaturas que você controla podem causar seus danos de combate ao jogador defensor neste turno como se não estivessem bloqueadas.

foreignData.flavorText: Инстинкт заволок весь его мир кровавой пеленой, в которой он смог различить только одно — свою жертву.
foreignData.name: Средоточие хищничества
foreignData.text: Вы можете позволить существам, которых вы контролируете, наносить в этот ход боевые повреждения обороняющемуся игроку, как если бы их не блокировали.

foreignData.flavorText: 本能让他眼中的世界染成血色，直到视野只剩下一样东西：他的猎物。
foreignData.name: 攫掠凝神
foreignData.text: 本回合中，你可以使由你操控的生物视同未受阻挡地对防御牌手造成战斗伤害。

name: Predatory Focus
originalText: You may have creatures you control deal their combat damage to defending player this turn as though they weren't blocked.

rulings.text: Will even apply to creatures that entered the battlefield after it resolved (which obviously must have Haste in order to attack).
If a creature is attacking a planeswalker, assigning its damage as though it weren’t blocked means the damage is assigned to the planeswalker, not to the defending player.

When Predatory Focus resolves, you choose whether to use its effect or not. If you choose to use it, all your creatures will deal their combat damage to the planeswalker or defending player this turn whether or not they become blocked. You can’t have any of them deal combat damage to creatures that block them. If you choose not to use its effect, nothing happens.

text: You may have creatures you control assign their combat damage this turn as though they weren't blocked.
